.sprite {
    background-image: url(data:image/png;base64,);
    background-repeat: no-repeat;
    display: block;
}

.sprite-Icon---Apple {
    width: 33px;
    height: 37px;
    background-position: -5px -5px;
}

.sprite-Icon---Google-Play {
    width: 36px;
    height: 39px;
    background-position: -48px -5px;
}

.sprite-logo-1 {
    width: 189px;
    height: 33px;
    background-position: -94px -5px;
}
